bike.description: Specialized FACT 10r carbon, FACT IS construction, compact race design, 1-1/2" lower HS bearing, OSBB

components.description: Specialized FACT carbon full monocoque, OS race for 1-1/2" bearing
1-1/8" upper and 1-1/5" lower Cr-Mo cartridge bearings integrated w/ headset, carbon 8mm cone spacer and 20mm of carbon spacers
Specialized Pro-Set, 3D forged 7050 aluminum, 4-position adjustable, 4-bolt 31.8mm clamp
Specialized Pro SL Carbon, classic bend
TRP 870 Equipe, forged aluminum, cartridge pads
TRP 870 Equipe, forged aluminum, cartridge pads
Black cage, body & toe clips w/ strap
S-Works Turbo, 700x23c, Aramid bead, 220TPI w/ Black Belt protection
S-Works Turbo, 700x23c, Aramid bead, 220TPI w/ Black Belt protection
Body Geometry Romin Expert w/ hollow Ti rails
Specialized Pro, FACT carbon w/ Zertz insert
Carbon chain stay protector, derailleur hanger, clear coat, owners manual
